src/parallel/zsc-3d-src/collisionrelax.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Collision step for order parameter distribution function f, collision and streaming steps for momentum distribution function g, and calculation of updated macroscopic quantities (velocity, pressure and order parameter) in the parallel D3Q7/D3Q19 Zheng-Shu-Chew multiphase LBM.
